sentences: Pikk hudi. L체kkas paadi hudjaga kaldast lahti.
Me oleme h채das! Tuult ei ole, hudjad ei ulata veel p천hja!
Peksis last, mis k채si kandis, vibutades hutja.
context: The word 'ulata' in Estonian is a verb that means to reach, extend, or stretch out. It appears in the dictionary definition in the context of boat poles not reaching far enough north without wind. This suggests it refers to the action of extending something (like a pole) forward or outward to achieve distance or coverage.
